query: SELECT a.title as album_title, COUNT(t.id) as track_count FROM albums a LEFT JOIN tracks t ON a.id = t.albumId WHERE a.title IN ('Rain That Learns to Pray', 'Color Theory for Hearts', 'Borrowed Hours', 'Where the Light Kneels', 'Open Map', 'City of Kindness', 'Systems & Ghosts', 'Baptism on the Freeway', 'Piano for the Storm', 'Freedom in Common Time', 'Blueprint for Blue Skies', 'Ledger of the Heart', 'Sky Inside the Temple', 'Hands of Fire', 'Breath, Becoming') GROUP BY a.id, a.title ORDER BY a.title
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.38fa72cffd94 --database b5PCTDMDy4xxT8TnZ4kC9Z --execute SELECT a.title as album_title, COUNT(t.id) as track_count FROM albums a LEFT JOIN tracks t ON a.id = t.albumId WHERE a.title IN ('Rain That Learns to Pray', 'Color Theory for Hearts', 'Borrowed Hours', 'Where the Light Kneels', 'Open Map', 'City of Kindness', 'Systems & Ghosts', 'Baptism on the Freeway', 'Piano for the Storm', 'Freedom in Common Time', 'Blueprint for Blue Skies', 'Ledger of the Heart', 'Sky Inside the Temple', 'Hands of Fire', 'Breath, Becoming') GROUP BY a.id, a.title ORDER BY a.title
